Text: Lpst Will you be making any stops today on the way homeIf notI can leave now if I want topart of my year celebration today Smile Being that Im not driving Im stuck like chuck Smile
I have a meeting today in C I hope Im back by five if not Go ahead without me Smile
GwenGwen is gone How are you Things are going great here Just working away Smile

RE Whats Going OnHey Homey I really do need to leave at If anything changes I will let you know Thanks From Patrice L nronXgate on PM To Ora ES cc Subject RE Whats Going On Are you on Enrons MSN Instant Messenger Will you be ready at today Original Message From Cross Ora Sent Thursday November AM To Mims Patrice L Subject Re Whats Going On I hear you my sistah You are so righthowever LIFE IS GOOD Smile From Patrice L nronXgate on AM To Ora ES cc Subject Whats Going On Whats happening down in your area Its very scary You just dont know whats going to happen Its a crying shame whats happening to Enron Who would have ever thought this

Re Whats Going OnI hear you my sistah You are so righthowever LIFE IS GOOD Smile From Patrice L nronXgate on AM To Ora ES cc Subject Whats Going On Whats happening down in your area Its very scary You just dont know whats going to happen Its a crying shame whats happening to Enron Who would have ever thought this

RE CommunicationAnytime before am and anytime after pm today From Patrice L nronXgate on AM To Ora ES cc Subject RE Communication Ill give a hollar when I take my smoke breakwhat times are good for you Original Message From Cross Ora Sent Wednesday November AM To Mims Patrice L Subject RE Communication I agree BULLSHITEven if I cant ride which I hope I canI wont know until laterIll keep you informed Maybe we can take a smoke break today Just let me know whenand of courseI ALWAYS KEEP THINGS ON THE DOWNLOWMy house is clean now I dont talk to anyoneand thats a good thing Smile From Patrice L nronXgate on AM To Ora ES cc Subject RE Communication Just a FYIRecent developmentsthere is a slim chance that you may here from Tony Conway or Donnell in the near future trying to be nosey about me and Lonnieplease keep everything on the downlow As time progressed things eventually were discussed regarding me that did not go well for Lonnie It is definitely not okay for him to talk to me because of my past relationships and I dont want to cause any more confusion for him with Tony Itsnt this childish Im a grown ass woman dealing with this shit regarding someone who doesnt mean a damn thing to me I hope Im not too late I hope we can roll tonight so I can fill you in I have a hair appointment so Ill be leaving at so let me know Original Message From Cross Ora Sent Tuesday November PM To Mims Patrice L Subject Communication Hey Homie I got a funny feeling I will be working late tonight Smile Thanks for your help on yesterday

RE Job InformationJust good would be sufficient Smile Its on the same order as the Civic Auditorium in Omaha Smile From Patrice L nronXgate on PM To Ora ES cc Subject RE Job Information Fannette in real estateshut yo mouthAngie and I are going to the Dance Theatre of Harlem tonight at jones hall and then we are going out Is jones hall fancy should i look real good or just good Original Message From Cross Ora Sent Friday October PM To Mims Patrice L Subject RE Job Information You are soooooooooooooo lateSmile Yes Ive seen Jewel i tried to show her to you once before we were headed to the garage Yes the looks great I asked her what was her secret and she said medical plus a lot of prayer I just wanted to know what she took to lose it Smile I heard that Cynthia lost a lot too And Fannette has been gone almost a year now Smile Shes also into Real Estate From Patrice L nronXgate on PM To Ora ES cc Subject RE Job Information Girl Is Fanette Perry still here and no have you seen Jewel Meeks shes lost a ton of weight and looks like her old self again Original Message From Cross Ora Sent Friday October AM To Mims Patrice L Subject RE Job Information YOU ARE WELCOME MY FRIENDIM GLAD TO KNOW YOURE STILL CHECKING YOUR EMAILS SMILE

Job InformationGood afternoon Ms Thurston Attached is the job posting per our conversation Have a groovy hip one Smile SR SERVICE SPECIALIST ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Overall implementation and contract compliance accountability Responsible for Deal profitability validation and reporting Bill payment invoicing and reporting validation and issue resolution Drive internal and external communications to ensure customer satisfaction and customer referenceability ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Bachelors Degree and three years experience in industryrelated field Individual must be detailoriented with ability to synthesize information from a number of sources Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously Selfstarter must seek out possible problems and proposefacilitate timely resolution Strong communication skills are necessary for interface with all levels of the organization external service providers and internal customers to ensure that customer expectations as related to service requests are resolved in a timely manner PREFERRED SKILLS Strong customer service orientation needed Proficiency with MS Word Excel PowerPoint and Lotus Notes email Proficiency with Internet usage Access and Siebel a plus SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS Excellent communication skills are required Processoriented analytical and qualityoriented thinking is a must Work efforts will be projectoriented and will focus on results and delivery Team orientation is a must Minimal travel may be required Work effort will be resultsoriented in a fastpaced environment CONTACT NA Job ID Department EES SERVICE MANAGEMENT II Company WHOLESALE RETAIL COMM ENRON ENERGY SERVICES Location HOUSTON TX Type Pay na FLSA class Manager HURTROBERT Recruiter JTAORMINA Log na Grade CP Response NA Relocation N Posting date OCT To respond to this job posting Make a note of the job ID position name department name and company name Then fill in this form An Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer This page is maintained by the Enron Corp Web Team Email questionscomments to
